text: The 920s was a decade that started on 1 January 920, and ended on 31 December 929. It is distinct from the decade known as the 93th decade which began on January 1, 921 and ended on December 31, 930. == Births == * 925: Ferdowsi حکیم ابوالقاسم فردوسی توسی (died 1020), Persian poet
title: 920s
